description.content: After going down the red slide and reaching the floating cargo containers, right before jumping onto the main island, you can jump to the half-submerged cargo container. You'll land in the water and have to swim a little bit to the cargo container, but you shouldn't die depending on how far you managed to jump. From here, jump towards the smaller island, where there will be a crate behind the rubble.
Once you reach the Atelier, the camp will be on the pathway around to the entrance.

title: Document - Messages - What Will You Choose

description.content: On the ground inside the Atelier.
